name: Cube Run (Monkey Studioz)
description:
In this game you are a little red cube in the big, wide expanse of space. Run through each of the levels to become an epic gamer!

This is also my first game ever, so it is not the best, but I didn't want to start with anything too hard. Thanks to Brackeys for the game idea and basic knowledge on how to make a game, and Dani for keeping me motivated with his hilarious videos. Enjoy!
